body_html: New version splits ninja stuff into a separate file and leaves it out of requirements by default. Travis was crashing with internal gcc compiler errors with ninja on for some reason. I wasn't able to reproduce them in the Docker images, but turning it off ninja by default should work around that.

I wasn't able to reproduce them in the Docker images, but turning it off ninja by default should work around that.
body: New version splits ninja stuff into a separate file and leaves it out of requirements by default. Travis was crashing with internal gcc compiler errors with ninja on for some reason. I wasn't able to reproduce them in the Docker images, but turning it off ninja by default should work around that.
